title: Kha'Zix Mains Club
body:
Really been wanting to have a nice Khazix main community on the client as we're few and far between. Open to everyone, whether you're new to Kha or a dedicated main, post your IGN below for an invite

* Club Name: KhaZix Gods
* Tag: KaZix (Somehow this tag was open)


Add my IGN  "SKT Light"  or post your name in the comments for a club invite :P

replies.body:
{{champion:267}} Spooky when long dead (and not sub-board related) threads come back from the grave!

While the art of thread necromancy can be useful in some cases, this unfortunately, is not one of those times. I am putting this poor zombie back gently into that good night. 

RIP thread.
Hey my ign is Filip2468, I have 200k mastery poitns on kjha, i would appreciate an invite
